info.name: Herby Vessel Table Lamp
info.description:
With its geometric edges and luxurious copper finish the Herby Table Lamp is a striking piece for any interior.

Dimensions: Height 30cm Width 15cm
Composition: Glass
Bulb requirement:1 x 40W Max E14 CNDL (bulb not included)
Self assembly requirements:no
Care Instructions:wipe clean with a soft dry cloth
